components

Interface IComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CCommandInput, CCommandQueue, CCommandSchemes, CComputerLevel, CDescription, CExit, CInPlayer, CInventory, CMaxWeight, CName, COutDialog, CPositionString, CWeight

    public interface IComponent
    An interface IComponent. A component must implements this interface to be able to be stored and attached as an entity's component by the ecs manager. An entity may hold an "infinite" number of components. Using reflection it is possible to find specific components attached to an entity.
